__e: Women hide them, you know, inside themselves.
"You know everything, why don't you want to tell me the truth?
If I'm going to help, we'll need everything out in the open.
All day long she has been trying to hide that she was anxious about him.
I won't conceal from you that I wish this hadn't happened.
I can't pretend that I'm not disappointed, but I'm sure you know best.
These men are hiding something, but that's not it.
You're hiding something, and I'll tell you what it is.
You've been keeping something from us this whole time, and it wasn't just a boyfriend.
"You see a man standing before you with nothing to hide." Is that right?
Although one can only imagine what she'd be so desperate to hide.
Let's just say, one of us has nothing to hide.
Trying to see if you have anything to hide.
I wonder what other secrets you're hiding.
If you're concealing anything, I urge you to reveal it now.
He told us he had nothing to hide, but we still had to subpoena him to get hold of it.
And I tried to keep it from him, but he knows.
- Hm, everyone has something to hide. But I won't tell anything you don't want me to.
